abstract: Francois Hollande, French lawyer and career politician, wins run-off election to become Socialist Party's presidential candidate; France's incumbent Pres Nicolas Sarkozy has yet to announce his candidacy for second term.
snippet: François Hollande, a lawyer and career politician, defeated the party leader. The incumbent, President Nicolas Sarkozy, has yet to announce his candidacy.
lead_paragraph: François Hollande, a lawyer and career politician, defeated the party leader. The incumbent, President Nicolas Sarkozy, has yet to announce his candidacy.

headline.main: Hollande Wins Runoff to Become Socialist Candidate for French Presidency
headline.print_headline: Career Politician Wins Socialist Vote to Vie for French Presidency
headline.seo: Francois Hollande Wins Runoff for Socialist Candidacy
